mapper.select: select sche_no,sche_title, sche_date, trunc(to_date(sche_date)-sysdate) "d_day", rank() over (order by trunc(to_date(sche_date)-sysdate, 0) asc),sche_notice from schedule where couple_num=1
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(couple_num, id, sche_title, sche_date, sche_notice, sche_typecode) values(1, 'kgg', #{sche_title}, #{sche_date}, #{sche_notice}, 'travel')
